when i open anything...

okay.

yes, yes.
then we have to press the power button, then it is deducted, else the fund is added.

see, like cutting the fees, etc.,
you will get 16-18% in this tenure.
if you are getting repayment and you add it back and return, then it will go above 20%.
because 70% of the lenders on the platform have 20+ returns on them, sir.
ma'am, it was written in front of the borrowers, 46%, 47%, what does it mean?
46%, 47%, whatever the returns are, sir, the interest rate is annualized, sir.
it is annualized.
if you take a 9-month tenure, it will be 9 divided by 12.
on that basis, yes.
understand that if we take an amount of rs 1000 for 1 month, if we calculate 47% of rs 1000, it will be rs 470.
but if we divide 9 by 12, you will get rs 350 on rs 1000.
rs 350 on rs 1000.
yes, rs 352.
and out of that, if we have some platform, like plant to plant differs.
for example, in 9 months tenure, we have 3 to 4%.
if we take 4% on rs 1000, then rs 40 will be deducted.
then you will earn an interest of rs 312 on rs 1000.
so, it will be calculated in the same way.
for example, the rs 1300 that i told you will come in installments.
if the borrower repays the monthly, then you will get the credit monthly.

yes, 9 months, 12 months.

returns are being made better on that of lenders.

those who have taken loans from our platform 2, 3, 4 times.
and if they pay on time, only then we give them a loan for the second or third time.
so, on this basis, it means that they are good borrowers.
even before, when they applied for a loan and paid 3 to 4 times, they will pay in the future also, most of the time.
so, in that way, it is considered to be medium risk, sir, our 9-month, sorry, 9-month and 12-month loan tenure.
so, i was saying that sir, there is some fund in your account balance which you have not invested.

today, it can be withdrawn.

if you do it in 9 months, then 18 to 20% returns will be made.

ok.
and the ones who are repeated borrowers of the platform, it is invested in them.

there are only 4-5 loans.

so out of that, if 4-4% cut is done, then it does not mean that you get more returns.
